changes.description:
Ensure that when a property is removed from a JSON schema object, that a
corresponding "required" entry is also removed.

Added the (unstable) `@httpChecksumRequired` trait to indicate an operation
requires a checksum in its HTTP request.

Fixed a bug in OpenApi conversion where removing authentication for an
operation would result in the operation inheriting the global "security"
configuration instead of having it set to none.
Added examples of building models to various guides.
